caption: Great location right by hotel, park, and metro. Good selection of restaurants. Geltato cart, Five Guys, and the Mexican restaurant were awesome! Crepe restaurant had slow apathetic service. There was a giant pile of trash sitting in front for a few days and we did see a huge rat coming out of a trash can.

charming and peaceful atmosphere, ideal for a quiet getaway. However cleanliness could be improved in certain areas, though it doesn't detract from the overall experience. It's a great spot for those looking to enjoy a relaxing stay with easy access to the city and nature.
Quiet happening place as it has all connectivity with the city. Bus stops and metro stations are all within walking distance. Restaurants are nearby and multiple options are available.
very beautiful place, feels antique. many restaurents and bars in the area. a big park nearby.
A wonderful village offering foods and drinks from bars and restaurants! Locating beside the Bercy gare, it is one of the best choice for taking a rest during your travel!

Place is amazing and full of life. The shopping area is altogether different experience than a conventional shopping center. This place is having amazing restaurants and the vibes are outstanding. Would have loved to spend more time but will definitely visit next time ! Short walk from Bercy train station.
nice place to visit, lots of unique store, stop by with metro 14 @cout Saint-Emilion
Plenty of great food options. Nothing much to do other than that. Quick walk from the train station.
Nice and relaxing place to walk around included restaurants, cafes, cinema, different shops ..

I have to give this place 5stars, if I could give it 10 I would. I absolutely love this place. Its always clean and has a great atmosphere to it. We always seem to have something great at the cafe there and all our favourites when visiting the city are found there.

Nice shopping area, situated in the south of Paris. It is not so big but there are many interesting shops and restaurants in this area. The place is beautiful, clean and nice. There is a cinema UGC next to. It is very convenient to come here with the metro (metro 14 Cour Saint-√âmilion), which is just at the front.

Open shopping mall with many shops, from low-end to mid-end. You can also find many restaurants. They sometimes have great decoration, like a roof of umbrellas. Overall, maintenance is good.  (Downside: when it rains, you have no protection at all.)
A place for food lovers.  Great place to visit.  Also for shopping.   Cloths. Kids toys. Electronics.  Food joints.  Theatre.  Crowded on weekends. Close to metro station
A surprising find for us. A really happy vibe here with lots of people out and about. Many choices of places to eat or just sit and people watch.
Very nice place. Loved the umbrellas over the main course. There are plenty of nice restaurants and stores to visit and maybe have a great time near the bus station of Bercy.
Excellent Location to have many things done. A mix of old and new, great dining options
The special hot bread in the starter was nice, missing taste for the bobun,  rice was too dry üò´  the drinks was special ‚Ä¶
Small but interesting place as a shopping and taste as many caf√© and restaurant, also cinema for taking the time
Very nice place. Cozy atmosphere,  not overcrowded like champs d‚Äòelys√©e

One of my favorite "quartiers" in Paris. It's a nice place to go to if you wanna get drinks outdoors when the weather is nice! There is even a really beautiful parc right next to it, if you feel like going for a walk or sit there.
Nice area with many shops and restaurants. Yes touristic but also nice.

It's a two row of the house and in the middle a very wide street where a lots of brand shops with cafe and restaurant... The house looks very old and this house are actually the shops... It's a very small street... And with that village there is very big park... So it's a wonderful place to spend a beautiful sunny evening...
Great space, filled with interesting niche shops and things to do. Excellent restaurants.
I loved this place , it has some magical charm ‚ú®Ô∏è üòç  the best spot is the cafe with the Harry Potter theme üòÄ ‚Ä¶
Looking for a quiet weekend with family or friends? Here's a charming park next to a delightful street full of different flavours and tastes to relish.
Super cozy to visit during christmas time.
About a dozen eating places, all reasonably priced, ate at 5 different restaurant in the area and most are good.
Loved it. Very nice place to visit and eat. Must see hidden gem!
Excellent choice od restaurants with easy parking and good transport links if you need thwm
A very unique village, worth the visit ‚ù§ The Christmas decorations and illuminations were really beautiful üòç ‚Ä¶
Excellent area for a small night out.
I love Bercy Village. Zing is a fantastic shop with unique products. Five guys, the frog and Indiana are great for food and drink. The cinema is great and for a sit down meal try la petite campagne
Amazing street view
Stumbled upon this amazing hidden 'village'. Super cosy during the evening with lots of places to eat and has an amazing and southern atmosphere.
I love this place . It was so beautiful and had almost everything available like shops. Was also near to metro station.

Omg Bercy Village was the best thing happened to me. I booked in Pullman hotel, which is across the street. Getting food was no problem. It's a mini "street" mall with a few shops and several restaurants. Pleasant at any time.

If you are catching a bus or train from the Bercy station, do not forget to visit this place just a little further. The old wine cellar houses and stables with carriageways are turned into a cute little shopping village with shops starting with make up and clothes to toy shop. There are a wide variety of options available to eat from and you won't be disappointed. Do keep 2 hours of time atleast if you plan to have a meal and shop here. The Bercy station from here is a good 15min walk through the park. Be sure to plan for it in advance.
